summary: Successfully completed comprehensive testing of Jam Sholat Digital KHGT Muhammadiyah app. All key requirements verified: Hijri calendar shows correct '3 Ramadan 1447 H' for Feb 20 2026, layout switching works perfectly via API (Modern/Classic/Layout2), Imsak times display during Ramadan, background image settings functional, and event countdown badges visible.

flaky_endpoints.symptoms: Username conflict on repeat registration attempts

passed_tests: KHGT Hijri calendar accuracy: 20 Feb 2026 = 3 Ramadan 1447 H (verified across all layouts)
Layout switching via API: Modern → Classic → Layout2 all working correctly
Classic layout displays mosque background images properly
Imsak prayer time (04:20) shows in all layouts during Ramadan period
Background image settings API accepts and stores custom images
Event countdown badge 'Nuzulul Quran -16 Hari' displays correctly
Modern layout: Dark glass theme with prayer cards grid and main clock
Classic layout: Fullscreen mosque background with bottom prayer bar
Layout2 (Al-Iftitar): Sidebar layout with Islamic quotes and content area
Prayer time highlighting shows 'BERIKUTNYA' for next prayer (Subuh)
Arabic text display working correctly (3 رمضان 1447 هـ)
Running text marquee functional on all layouts
Content slideshow and mosque identity display working
Backend API testing: 95.8% success rate (23/24 tests passed)
All CRUD operations functional (content, agenda, running-text)
Authentication and authorization working with JWT tokens
